lead_paragraph: MULLEN--Doran A.,72, of New York City, Southampton, and Palm Beach, passed away peacefully on Friday, May 13, at The Dawn Greene Hospice in New York City. He is survived by his partner of 42 years, Charles O. Donnaud IV; brothers, Joseph and his wife Nancy of Franklin, MA, and Michael of Sinking Spring, PA; and sisterin-law Nancy of New York City. He was predeceased by his brother Thomas, who passed away earlier this year. In addition to a successful career with Metropolitan Life Insurance, he was Past President of St. George's Society of New York, The New England Society in the City of New York and The Knickerbocker Republican Club. He was also an active member of The Amateur Comedy Club. A Mass of Christian burial will be celebrated on Tuesday, May 24 at 3pm, at Church of Our Saviour, 59 Park Ave., New York, NY 10016. In lieu of flowers, the family asks that donations be made in memory of Doran A. Mullen to: Calvary Hospice, 1740 Eastchester Road Bronx, NY 10461; or Church of Our Saviour, 59 Park Ave., New York, NY 10016. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MULLEN, DORAN A.
